## hiddenWhenPointerFine variable

Hide when [pointer media feature](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/@media/pointer) is `fine` (not `coarse` or `none`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
hiddenWhenPointerFine: SerializedStyles
```
